trans-unit.source: Represents the launch information required by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> that has initiated in response to a peer collaboration invitation.

An application can inspect the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A> properties in this class to get the information specific to the invitation that initiated the application launch.
Access to this class requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
Gets or sets application-defined binary data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> invitation.
This data blob is free form and is provided by the caller.
The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes.
The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A> cannot be `null`.
An array of bytes that containing the data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation.
Get or set a message associated with the response to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation.
The maximum length for the message is 255 Unicode characters.
Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.

A text message associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the invitation was sent.
Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> invitation was sent.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> that sent the invitation.
Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> that sent the invitation.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> invitation was sent.
Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> from which the invitation was sent.
